prompt_sent_to_api:
You are a senior clinical geneticist. Your task is to synthesize findings from the provided analytical tool reports into a single, ranked list of potential diagnoses.

Create a master list of all unique disease candidates from all reports. Then, rank them from most to least plausible based on the strength of the evidence (consensus across tools, high scores/ranks).

Your final output must be a numbered list. Each line should contain only the rank, disease name, and OMIM ID. Do not include any reasoning or other text.

**Example Output:**
1. DISEASE NAME 1 (OMIM:XXXXXX)
2. DISEASE NAME 2 (OMIM:YYYYYY)
3. DISEASE NAME 3 (OMIM:ZZZZZZ)

---
INPUT CONTEXT

II. Analytical Tool Reports

PubCaseFinder Report (Phenotype-based):
- branchiooculofacial syndrome (Score: 1.000)
- intellectual disability-hypotonic facies syndrome, X-linked, 1 (Score: 0.859)
- Basilicata-Akhtar syndrome (Score: 0.857)
- arthrogryposis multiplex congenita 5 (Score: 0.854)
- intellectual disability-balding-patella luxation-acromicria syndrome (Score: 0.841)

Zero-Shot Diagnosis Report (Generative AI-based):
- KABUKI SYNDROME 1; KABUK1 (Rank: 1)
- BRANCHIOOCULOFACIAL SYNDROME; BOFS (Rank: 2)
- WAARDENBURG SYNDROME, TYPE 1; WS1 (Rank: 3)
- BRANCHIOOTORENAL SYNDROME 1; BOR1 (Rank: 4)
- SAETHRE-CHOTZEN SYNDROME; SCS (Rank: 5)

GestaltMatcher Report (Facial Dysmorphology-based):
- Facioscapulohumeral muscular dystrophy (Score: 0.457)
- Coffin-Siris syndrome (Score: 0.456)
- COHEN-GIBSON SYNDROME; COGIS (Score: 0.418)
- FACIAL PALSY, CONGENITAL, WITH PTOSIS AND VELOPHARYNGEAL DYSFUNCTION; FPVEPD (Score: 0.412)
- Autism, susceptiblity to (Score: 0.399)

Phenotype Similarity Search Report (Vector-based):
- MICROCEPHALIC PRIMORDIAL DWARFISM, MONTREAL TYPE (OMIM: 210700, Score: 0.724)
- ECTODERMAL DYSPLASIA 13, HAIR/TOOTH TYPE (OMIM: 617392, Score: 0.717)
- WAARDENBURG SYNDROME, TYPE 1 (OMIM: 193500, Score: 0.708)
- SHORT STATURE, HEARING LOSS, RETINITIS PIGMENTOSA, AND DISTINCTIVE FACIES (OMIM: 617763, Score: 0.706)
- ECTODERMAL DYSPLASIA 14, HYPOHIDROTIC/HAIR/TOOTH/NAIL TYPE (OMIM: 618180, Score: 0.704)

III. Supporting Literature
Web Search Results (Literature/Case Reports):
- Title: Branchiooculofacial syndrome (Concept Id: C0376524) - MedGen -
  Snippet: The provided text is incomplete and does not contain sufficient information to create a structured summary. Please provide the full article or additional details for me to proceed.
- Title: Craniofacial dysmorphism, skeletal anomalies, and impaired
  Snippet: The provided article text is incomplete. Please provide the full text of the article so I can create a structured summary. If the article is not medically related, I will let you know.
